cl.clayster.exi

Class EXISetupConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siemens.ct.exi.helpers.DefaultEXIFactory
      • cl.clayster.exi.EXISetupConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.siemens.ct.exi.EXIFactory, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class EXISetupConfiguration
extends com.siemens.ct.exi.helpers.DefaultEXIFactory
    Contains all relevant values to setup EXI compression options in order to propose them to the server and use them for compresses communication according to the XEP-0322 protocol.
    Author:
    Javier Placencio

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EXISetupConfiguration()
      Constructs a new EXISetupConfigurations and initializes it with Default Values.

    • Method Detail

      • getSchemaId

        public java.lang.String getSchemaId()

      • setSchemaId

        public void setSchemaId(java.lang.String schemaId)

      • getAlignmentCode

        public int getAlignmentCode()
        Returns a number to represent each data alignment option. Possible values are 0, 1, 2 or 3 meaning Bit alignment, byte alignment, pre compression, and compression, respectively.
        Returns:
        the alignment code representing the chosen option

      • getAlignmentString

        public java.lang.String getAlignmentString()
        Returns the current aligment option as it is represented within XML stanzas according to XEP-0322.
        Returns:
        a string representing the alignment option being used

      • setSessionWideBuffers

        public void setSessionWideBuffers(boolean sessionWideBuffers)
        Sets if session wide buffers are being used or not. Session wide buffers allow compression related values to be remembered during the connection with the server, achieving better encoding and compactness.
        Parameters:
        sessionWideBuffers -

      • isSessionWideBuffers

        public boolean isSessionWideBuffers()

      • setStrict

        public void setStrict(boolean strict)

      • getCanonicalSchemaLocation

        public java.lang.String getCanonicalSchemaLocation()
        Returns a String representing the location of the canonical schema that this configuration will use for compression.
        Returns:
        a String representing the location of the canonical schema for this configurations

      • saveConfiguration

        public boolean saveConfiguration()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Saves this EXI configurations to a file, unless the same configurations have been saved already
        Returns:
        true if this configurations are saved, false otherwise
        Throws:

      • parseQuickConfigId

        public static EXISetupConfiguration parseQuickConfigId(java.lang.String configId)
                                                throws org.dom4j.DocumentException
        Looks for a saved EXISetupConfiguration that have been previously used for compression.
        Parameters:
        configId - the configuration ID being loaded
        Returns:
        the saved EXISetupConfiguration if it exists, null otherwise
        Throws:
        org.dom4j.DocumentException

      • exists

        public boolean exists()
        Checks if the configuration given has been used before, in order to know if quick setup configurations can be used.
        Parameters:
        exiConfig - EXI Setup Configurations being cheked
        Returns:
        true if the configuration has been used, false otherwise
